actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide funds for construction of irrigation facilities in the Pleasant Valley Water District, California.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to make the Pleasant Valley Water District part of the San Luis unit of the Central Valley project. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, for the purpose of furnishing water for irrigation for any lands within the Pleasant Valley Water District, to enter into a contract for the sale of up to 100,000 acre feet of water under applicable Federal reclamation law provisions. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide funds for construction of irrigation facilities in the Pleasant Valley Water District, California.
